resources.string: Text recognition is the process of detecting text in images and video streams and recognizing the text contained therein. Once detected, the recognizer then determines the actual text in each block and segments it into lines and words. This Text API detects text in Latin based languages (French, German, English, etc.), in real-time, on device.

With ML Kit a\s text recognition APIs, you can recognize text in any Latin-based language (and more, with Cloud-based text recognition).Text recognition can automate tedious data entry for credit cards, receipts, and business cards. With the Cloud-based API, you can also extract text from pictures of documents, which you can use to increase accessibility or translate documents. Apps can even keep track of real-world objects.
